A special area in the Holy Tree Domain, replacing {LOC_DISTRICT_PRESERVE_NAME}. Initially unlocked, with lower construction cost and no price increase, it can be built regardless of population demand. After completion, it will add +2 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +2 [ICON_Gold] Gold to surrounding cells. [NEWLINE] After {LOC_BUILDING_GROVE_NAME} is built, surrounding cells will add +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith +2 [ICON_Science] Science. [NEWLINE] After {LOC_BUILDING_SANCTUARY_NAME} is built, surrounding cells will add +2 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +2 [ICON_Science] Science. [NEWLINE] Improved cells also enjoy the above effects.

The special area of ​​the Holy Tree Domain, replacing {LOC_DISTRICT_THEATER_NAME}, initially unlocked, free to build and no price increase, can be built regardless of population demand. Has unique [ICON_Culture] culture and [ICON_Faith] faith adjacency bonus

Special support unit, it has combat power, and all units in the formation gain the movement power of this unit [NEWLINE] [COLOR: ResMilitaryLabelCS] This unit has a very high maintenance cost, please build it with caution! [ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE] Research {LOC_TECH_STIRRUPS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_BALLISTICS_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMBUSTION_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_SYNTHETIC_MATERIALS_NAME} to improve the combat power of the unit [ICON_Strength] [NEWLINE] Research {LOC_TECH_FLIGHT_NAME}, {LOC_TECH_COMPUTERS_NAME} to improve the range and field of view of the unit [ICON_Range] [NEWLINE] + High mobility [NEWLINE] + High long-range combat power [NEWLINE] + Can form a formation with military units [NEWLINE] - High maintenance cost [NEWLINE] - Can be restrained by all units
The girl who doesn't like to communicate with others always looks at the night sky quietly by herself, and seems to have had a dark childhood.

The lively and carefree Maekibo is the biggest troublemaker in the Eye of the Deep Space. She uses all her excess energy on pranks and claims to have an air friend named "Houki", but no one knows whether Houki's existence is true or not.

The most popular modifier in the headquarters, affectionately called "Little Osiris" by everyone. When he finds his companions in trouble, he will quietly offer help to the best of his ability, always putting his companions' affairs first.

Leviathan is full of energy every day, but she is a little cutie who gets confused occasionally. Although she is naive and lively, she is unexpectedly a little jealous. Please don't act too intimate with Vidal in front of her.

The corrector who was brought back from a frozen primordial zone looked a little cold and lonely because of her solitary life for many years, and she didn't seem to be very good at interpersonal communication.

Skadi is one of the few field correctors of the Ninth Department who is directly under the command of Xio, and is responsible for investigating signs of visual wreckage activities in the ocean area. Although she looks careless on the surface, she can always show the courage of a captain at the critical moment.

The girl who joined the Deep Space Eye on the condition of "conducting free research and invention" is currently working in the Hidden Science Team. However, although she is working, she hardly participates in the battle against the Vision Corpse, and seems to be only interested in inventions and tarot cards.

One of the main leaders of the Hidden Science Team, he developed most of the AI ​​systems in Deep Space Eye, including the "Mimi System". With the goal of completely destroying the Vision Corpse, he pursues precision and efficiency in everything.

Hodel, a member of the Intelligence Department, is a twin with his sister Bader. Unlike his sister who is cheerful and generous, Hodel just follows his sister's light silently and does not show himself too much.
He looks exactly like Osiris, but his inner dominant personality is the crazy "Pluto" who possesses great power and disdains to cooperate with other modifiers.

The leader of the Deep Space Eyes "Thunder Team", the strongest fighter in the organization. In the various operations of the team, even if there are constant problems, she can always rely on her strength to force them to be completed in the end. Thor has a strong sense of justice, but corresponding to her wild fighting style, she often handles things impulsively.

Special improvement facilities, only some modifier leaders can build, +2 [ICON_Production] productivity, +1 charm for surrounding cells, improvement facilities can get an additional 100% [ICON_Gold] gold output on the cell charm value, after researching {LOC_TECH_INDUSTRIALIZATION_NAME}, improvement facilities can get 25% [ICON_Tourism] tourism performance on the gold output, can only be built on cells with forests or rainforests

Special improvement facilities, only some modifier leaders can build, {LOC_TECH_MINING_NAME} unlocked, +1 [ICON_Science] research, adjacent different landforms and improvement facilities can get extra output, after researching related technologies, you can get more [ICON_Science] research, [ICON_Food] food, [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Production] productivity, can only be built on snow hills

Special improvement facilities, only some of the leaders of the modifiers can build, +1 [ICON_Culture] culture +1 [ICON_Production] productivity, adjacent to different landforms and improvement facilities can obtain additional output, and after researching related technologies, more [ICON_Food] food, [ICON_Gold] gold coins and [ICON_Production] productivity will be obtained. It can only be built on frozen soil, frozen hills, and snow.

Special improvement facilities, only some of the modifier leaders can build, unlocked by {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME}, +2 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, adjacent improvement facilities can obtain additional output, and more output can be obtained after researching related technologies.

Special improvement facilities, only some of the modifier leaders can build, unlocked by {LOC_TECH_SHIPBUILDING_NAME}, +2 [ICON_Production] productivity +1 [ICON_Science] research, adjacent improvement facilities can obtain additional output, and more output can be obtained after researching related technologies.

Tianyuan Divine Domain special area, replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_COMMERCIAL_HUB_NAME}, initially unlocked, cheaper and no price increase, can be built regardless of population demand. Has unique [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus, and gains 2 [ICON_TradeRoute] trade routes and 2 merchants after completion. For cities created by you, Tianlu Trade [ICON_Gold] gold coin adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Science] science value

Tianyuan Divine Domain special area, replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_HOLY_SITE_NAME}, initially unlocked, free to build and no price increase, can be built regardless of population demand. Has unique [ICON_Food] food adjacent bonus, [ICON_Food] food adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Faith] faith. Cities created by you, Sifangyuan [ICON_Food] food adjacent bonus also provides [ICON_Culture] culture value

Special improvement facilities. Only the leaders of the fixers in Tianyuan Divine Realm can build them. +3 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +2 [ICON_Faith] Faith. After researching related technologies, you will get more [ICON_Production] Productivity.
Building a city can gain a huge amount of territory, Hills +2 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Production] Production

Born in Xuheng, he has been practicing Tiantongshu with his teacher Xihe in Ruomu Palace on Nanjiao Island since he was a child. He is righteous and upright, but for some reason he has some middle school syndrome. Following his teacher's instructions, he is currently traveling down the mountain to gain experience.

The agent of Sifangyuan Nandao, who was born as a doctor, knows the sufferings of the people. She set up a clinic "Chiqitang" in Nanjiao and opened many branches to spread the symptoms and solutions. Lingguang often sits in the clinic in person to treat patients who come to seek medical treatment and listen to their trivialities in life.

Nile Domain Specialty District, replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_HOLY_SITE_NAME}, initially unlocked, cheaper and no price increase, can be built regardless of population requirements, +3 [ICON_Housing] housing, no adjacent bonuses and has ten expert slots, after completion, each [ICON_Citizen] in the city gains +2 [ICON_Faith]

Nile Domain Special Zone, replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_INDUSTRIAL_ZONE_NAME}, initially unlocked, free to build and no price increase, can be built regardless of population requirements, +3 [ICON_Housing] housing, no adjacent bonus and has ten expert slots, after completion, each [ICON_Citizen] in the city gains +2 [ICON_Production] productivity

Special improvement facilities, which can only be built by the leaders of the Nile Domain, +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +4 [ICON_Housing] Housing +2 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity. More output can be obtained after researching related technologies. It is allowed to be built on floodplains, oases, and swamps without resources.

Desert Plains and Desert Hills +2 [ICON_Food] Food +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Science] Science, Grassland Floodplains +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity +3 Charisma, Plains Floodplains +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +3 Charisma, Desert Floodplains, Swamps, and Oases +3 Charisma, Forests and Rainforests -3 Charisma, Farmland can be built on Desert Plains, +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold per [ICON_Citizen]

An operations specialist in the Major Crime Countermeasures Division of Kolge, codenamed "Cat", but still in the internship stage, his colleagues affectionately call him "Kitty". Currently, he is carrying out various missions with Anubis, calling him "Senior".
A white-haired stalker who seems a bit cynical and likes to play tricks on the younger generations. The most likely place to find her is during the bustling festivals.

Unique Improvement, only some Modifier Leaders can build, +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for surrounding plots, more [ICON_Production] Productivity after researching related technologies, can be built on Grasslands, Grassland Hills, Grassland Floodplains, Plains, Plains Hills, Plains Floodplains, Deserts, Desert Hills, Desert Floodplains, Oases and Swamps without resources

Special improvement facilities, only the leaders of the Modifiers in the Alterac Mountains can build, +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith +1 [ICON_Science] Science +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenity, +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith for the surrounding mountain cells, can only be built on mountains. Units can consume 2 [ICON_Movement] points of movement to enter from one point and then leave from another point

Citizens can improve mountain tiles and the purchase cost is reduced by 70%, and the purchase cost of flat tiles is reduced by 30%. Mountains +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Productivity +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith +1 [ICON_Science] Science +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture

Alterac Valley Specialty District, replaces {LOC_DISTRICT_THEATER_NAME}, initially unlocked, cheaper to build and does not increase in price, can be built regardless of population requirements, has unique adjacency bonus and has three specialist slots, adds +1 [ICON_Food] Food +1 [ICON_Production] Production +1 [ICON_Gold] Gold +1 [ICON_Faith] Faith +1 [ICON_Science] Science +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture to surrounding mountain tiles

A corrector who has the ability to enter dreams and invite others into dreams. However, since she cannot control this ability well, she is now adopted by Hades in the Muse Association and taken care of by Hades' two puppet maids.

The actual person in charge of the Muse Association, she is responsible for coordinating and managing all the affairs of the Muse Association as a corrector. She is feared in the parliament because of her terrifying personality and appearance that has not changed in thirty years, and is called the "ageless witch."

Although it is hard for outsiders to believe, Lu Liang is indeed the current president of Tianlu Trading. It is precisely because of her outstanding business ability that Tianlu Trading has achieved its current status. In addition, she is also one of the leaders of the Xuheng District Corrector Organization.

The HR director of Tianlu Trading. He looks dull but has a sharp mind and values ​​efficiency in everything. Before awakening, he lived with his sister Linyu and experienced many hardships. Privately, he likes to travel around alone and has accumulated a lot of unconventional knowledge of unknown use.
